short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When browsing GitHub, this extension links to the TypeScript playground from every TypeScript-flavoured codeblock

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds links to the TypeScript playground throughout GitHub. It's very minimal on work it does, so it won't slow down your browsing.
